welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Karranah, Bahrain! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bahrain International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Bahrain International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password provided by the airport staff.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport is used by the Bahraini Air Force and other military operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting the 'Sakhir Airport WiFi' network and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at King Abdulaziz AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at King Abdulaziz AB Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained from information desks.
